functions.name: register
functions.description: Registers a folder which should be available as a resource:// url.

parameters.name: namespace
parameters.description: The namespace to be used for the new resource:// url. JSM files in the specified folder will be accessible at 'resource://namespace/file.jsm'

parameters.name: folder
parameters.description: The folder relative to the root of the extension, which should be made available via the resource url. The root folder is used, if no folder is specified.
